metadata.title: CVE-2016-7103 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jQuery UI before 1.12.0 might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the closeText parameter of the dialog function.

criterions.comment: jqueryui package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.1+dfsg-4').
